sep.gaia.renderer

Class GaiaRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • sep.gaia.renderer.GaiaRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, javax.media.opengl.GLEventListener

    public class GaiaRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.media.opengl.GLEventListener
    Being an implementation of GLEventListener, this object draws, updates and destroys all graphical components.
    Author:
    Michael Mitterer (specification), Matthias Fisch (implementation)
